page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area was divided equally between two coordinating schools: Queen Elizabeth's Boys (Barnet) and Furzehill Middle (Boreham Wood). Queen Elizabeth's coordinated the collection of information in the Barnet block of the rectangle; Furzehill the Hertfordshire area. Schools found difficulty in collecting information due to the action taken by teachers over the pay dispute (1985) and exceptionally bad weather during the summer weeks which made field work very difficult. Contributing schools were: Queen Elizabeth's Boys Foulds J.M.I. Underhill Junior School Furzehill Middle School
